attributes.action: Stop taking carers allowance off income based welfare
attributes.additional_details:
Iam a Carer  for my  disabled husband   He is not eligible for contributions based welfare anything I earn including carers allowance is taken off  our joint claim of income based esa.   

the government say.We are entitled  to a total. Of £219  pw Because we are a couple. Because of caring responsibilities  , limited capability for work and in. Esa surport group.Anything I earn Including Carers allowance is taken off that amount £1 for £1   Meaning we are permanently on the bare minimum
attributes.background: Currently Carers allowance is taken off income based  welfare.   For example income support. Income based esa and universal credit   This penalise.families couples who rely on income based welfare.  Not all can work and care.
